titleStmt.title: The prophecyes of the incomparable Dr. Martin Luther concerning the downfall of the Pope of Rome, and the subversion of the German Empire, to be over-run by the armies of the Turks, together with the many reasons that he giveth for it : as also, the remarkable prophecy of the learned and reverend Mvscvlvs, to the same effect / collected by R.C. M.A.
titleStmt.author: R. C., M.A.
Luther, Martin, 1483-1546.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Andrew Kembe, and Edward Thomas ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
